verses.verse: I <WG1473> charge <WG1263> thee therefore <WG3767> before <WG1799> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, who <WG3588> shall <WG3195> judge <WG2919> the quick <WG2198> and <WG2532> the dead <WG3498> at <WG2596> his <WG846> appearing <WG2015> and <WG2532> his <WG846> kingdom <WG932>;

Preach <WG2784> the word <WG3056>; be instant <WG2186> in season <WG2122>, out of season <WG171>; reprove <WG1651>, rebuke <WG2008>, exhort <WG3870> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> longsuffering <WG3115> and <WG2532> doctrine <WG1322>.

For <WG1063> the time <WG2540> will come <WG2071> when <WG3753> they will <WG430> not <WG3756> endure <WG430> sound <WG5198> doctrine <WG1319>; but <WG235> after <WG2596> their own <WG2398> lusts <WG1939> shall they heap <WG2002> to themselves <WG1438> teachers <WG1320>, having itching <WG2833> ears <WG189>;
And <WG2532> they shall turn away <WG3303> <WG654> their ears <WG189> from <WG575> the truth <WG225>, and <WG1161> shall be turned <WG1624> unto <WG1909> fables <WG3454>.

But <WG1161> watch <WG3525> thou <WG4771> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956>, endure afflictions <WG2553>, do <WG4160> the work <WG2041> of an evangelist <WG2099>, make full proof <WG4135> of thy <WG4675> ministry <WG1248>.
For <WG1063> I <WG1473> am <WG4689> now <WG2235> ready to be offered <WG4689>, and <WG2532> the time <WG2540> of my <WG1699> departure <WG359> is at hand <WG2186>.
I have fought <WG75> a good <WG2570> fight <WG73>, I have finished <WG5055> my course <WG1408>, I have kept <WG5083> the faith <WG4102>:

Henceforth <WG3063> there is laid up <WG606> for me <WG3427> a crown <WG4735> of righteousness <WG1343>, which <WG3739> the Lord <WG2962>, the righteous <WG1342> judge <WG2923>, shall give <WG591> me <WG3427> at <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>: and <WG1161> not <WG3756> to me <WG1698> only <WG3440>, but <WG235> unto all them <WG3956> also <WG2532> that love <WG25> his <WG846> appearing <WG2015>.
Do thy diligence <WG4704> to come <WG2064> shortly <WG5030> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165>:

For <WG1063> Demas <WG1214> hath forsaken <WG1459> me <WG3165>, having loved <WG25> this present <WG3568> world <WG165>, and <WG2532> is departed <WG4198> unto <WG1519> Thessalonica <WG2332>; Crescens <WG2913> to <WG1519> Galatia <WG1053>, Titus <WG5103> unto <WG1519> Dalmatia <WG1149>.

Only <WG3441> Luke <WG3065> is <WG2076> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>. Take <WG353> Mark <WG3138>, and bring him <WG71> with <WG3326> thee <WG4572>: for <WG1063> he is <WG2076> profitable <WG2173> to me <WG3427> for <WG1519> the ministry <WG1248>.
And <WG1161> Tychicus <WG5190> have I sent <WG649> to <WG1519> Ephesus <WG2181>.

The cloke <WG5341> that <WG3739> I left <WG620> at <WG1722> Troas <WG5174> with <WG3844> Carpus <WG2591>, when thou comest <WG2064>, bring <WG5342> with thee, and <WG2532> the books <WG975>, but especially <WG3122> the parchments <WG3200>.
Alexander <WG223> the coppersmith <WG5471> did <WG1731> me <WG3427> much <WG4183> evil <WG2556>: the Lord <WG2962> reward <WG591> him <WG846> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> works <WG2041>:
Of whom <WG3739> be <WG5442> thou <WG4771> ware <WG5442> also <WG2532>; for <WG1063> he hath <WG436> greatly <WG3029> withstood <WG436> our <WG2251> words <WG3056>.

At <WG1722> my <WG3450> first <WG4413> answer <WG627> no man <WG3762> stood <WG4836> with me <WG3427>, but <WG235> all <WG3956> men forsook <WG1459> me <WG3165>: I pray God that it may <WG3049> not <WG3361> be laid <WG3049> to their charge <WG846>.

Notwithstanding <WG1161> the Lord <WG2962> stood <WG3936> with me <WG3427>, and <WG2532> strengthened <WG1743> me <WG3165>; that <WG2443> by <WG1223> me <WG1700> the preaching <WG2782> might be fully known <WG4135>, and <WG2532> that all <WG3956> the Gentiles <WG1484> might hear <WG191>: and <WG2532> I was delivered <WG4506> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the lion <WG3023>.

And <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> shall deliver <WG4506> me <WG3165> from <WG575> every <WG3956> evil <WG4190> work <WG2041>, and <WG2532> will preserve <WG4982> me unto <WG1519> his <WG846> heavenly <WG2032> kingdom <WG932>: to whom <WG3739> be glory <WG1391> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.
Salute <WG782> Prisca <WG4251> and <WG2532> Aquila <WG207>, and <WG2532> the household <WG3624> of Onesiphorus <WG3683>.
Erastus <WG2037> abode <WG3306> at <WG1722> Corinth <WG2882>: but <WG1161> Trophimus <WG5161> have I left <WG620> at <WG1722> Miletum <WG3399> sick <WG770>.

Do thy diligence <WG4704> to come <WG2064> before <WG4253> winter <WG5494>. Eubulus <WG2103> greeteth <WG782> thee <WG4571>, and <WG2532> Pudens <WG4227>, and <WG2532> Linus <WG3044>, and <WG2532> Claudia <WG2803>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the brethren <WG80>.

The Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with <WG3326> thy <WG4675> spirit <WG4151>. Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216>. Amen <WG281>. Â¶ The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
